speaker: Vinod Kurpad
title: Knowledge Stores In Azure Cognitive Search
description:
This video helps the user understand how to add the knowledge store to a skillset in Azure Cognitive Search. Knowledge store enables users to explore the enriched data with Power BI, generate training datasets for building custom models and projecting the data for use in scenarios other than search.
